thread.title: Conevenient weekend stay
thread.title_full: Conevenient weekend stay - Review of ONE UN New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: RcikS
title: Conevenient weekend stay
text: Onthe wseekend the UN area is pretty quiet. We stayed here overnight and then went to Brooklyn to watch the half marathon. The rooms were fairly spartan but the service and price were exceptonal. There was a weekend rate that made a lot of sense. The convenience of the midtown location also made sense.
